title: Wolverine PS5: Will It Be Rated M? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.14.21
description:
Season 2 of Last Laugh premiers on September 9th on Rooster Teeth, and you can head over there now to binge watch all of Season 1!

Get 25% off, up to $10 value, and zero delivery fees on your first order when you download the DoorDash app in the App Store and enter code GAMES2021.
